name: Blue Ocean Interactive Marketing
tagline: Calgary Web Design and Online Marketing Agency
description:
Our entire team is passionate about what they do.
Headquartered in Calgary, Alberta, Canada, Blue Ocean Interactive Marketing is a strategic web design and online marketing agency who services clients across North America. We have experience working with businesses in a wide range of industries, as well as professional associations and government organizations.
Blue Ocean delivers and executes marketing campaigns and strategies across ANY form of online and offline media.
